The things that we fear the most have already happened to us...

A department store photo clerk, Seymour &#039;Sy&#039; Parrish, is exceptionally knowledgeable about 
photography, and has been developing photos for the Yorkin family since their son was a baby. 
However, Sy also lives a very solitary and lonely life - with no wife, girlfriend, or family in the 
picture. Sy begins to develop a disturbing obsession with the Yorkins and what they have, and when 
he is fired for theft he goes over the top. Having discovered a disturbing secret about Mr. Yorkin, 
he exacts angry revenge in a chilling manner...
